1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0: presents now generate in cold biomes, updated wrapped present textures, reduced maximal amount of tnt in a (crafted) present to 1

empty presents and presents can now be crafted with dye to change their color/ribbon color,
tweaked worldgen a bit

fixed a bug randomly breaking recipes,
fixed a bug crashing servers,
potion effects now spawn immediately instead of being launched upwards
